name: 古碧源
objective:
線性電路；電算放大器；二極體；非線性電路應用；接面場
效電晶體（JFET）；金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體 (MOSFET)
；雙極性接面電晶體（BJT）；差動放大器；多級放大器。金
氧半電晶體；雙接面電晶體；差動及多極放大器；功率放大
器；頻率響應；回授；類比積體電路；濾波器；調諧放大器
；振盪器。
schedule:
1 (2/21,23): Biasing
2 (2/28,3/2): 2/28 National Holiday; 3/2 Discrete-circuit amplifiers
3 (3/7,9): IC biasing
4 (3/14,16): Basic gain cell and CG/CB amplifiers
5 (3/21,23): Cascode amplifier
6 (3/28,30): Transistor pairings
7 (4/4,6): Spring break
8 (4/11,13): MOS differential amplifiers。
9 (4/18,20): BJT differential amplifers
10 (4/25,27): Low-frequency response
11 (5/2,4): High-frequency response
12 (5/9,11): Basics of feedback
13 (5/16,18): Feedback voltage amplifiers
14 (5/23,25): Other feedback amplifier types
15 (5/30,6/1): Basics of output stages
16 (6/6,8): Class A and Class B amplifiers
17 (6/13,15): Class AB amplifiers, 6/25 端午節放假。
18 (6/22): Final exam
scorePolicy:
期中考試：65%（2-3 次）
期末考試：25%
平時與出勤考核：10%
materials: Microelectronic Circuits, International 8th Ed, Adel Sedra, Kenneth Smith, Tony Chan Carusone, & Vincent Gaudet, Oxford University Press, 2021.
